Network connections from internal system.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections where the destination hostname matches known text storage sites (e.g., pastebin.com). Use frequency analysis to identify systems with an unusually high number of connections to these sites.

Unusually large data uploads or uploads.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for upload activity (e.g., POST requests via HTTP, large bytes_out in conn.log) directed towards known text storage sites. Calculate descriptive statistics (mean, median, standard deviation) for upload sizes and identify outliers using IQR or standard deviation methods.
